headline: Philip Morris Transformation Accelerates With IQOS and ZYN Growth
summary: PM's second-quarter results show smoke-free gains lifting revenues and profit, even as cigarette volumes continue to decline.

raw.headline: Philip Morris Transformation Accelerates With IQOS and ZYN Growth
raw.summary: PM's second-quarter results show smoke-free gains lifting revenues and profit, even as cigarette volumes continue to decline.

headline: What's Driving Altria Group's Growth in OCI for Smokeables?
summary: MO's smokeable margins jumped 2.9 percentage points to 64.5% as pricing power and cost cuts offset sharp volume declines.

raw.headline: What's Driving Altria Group's Growth in OCI for Smokeables?
raw.summary: MO's smokeable margins jumped 2.9 percentage points to 64.5% as pricing power and cost cuts offset sharp volume declines.

headline: Philip Morris International to Host Webcast of Fireside Chat Session at Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference
summary: STAMFORD, CT, August 26, 2025--Regulatory News: Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) (NYSE: PM) will host a live webcast of a fireside chat session with Jacek Olczak, Chief Executive Officer, at the 2025 Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference at www.pmi.com/2025barclays on Tuesday, September 2, 2025, at approximately 11:15 a.m. ET. An archived copy of the webcast will be available for six months post-event.
